products.title: Samsonite Winfield 2 Hardside Luggage
products.description: Durable polycarbonate hardside spinner luggage with TSA-approved lock and expandable design. Perfect for international travel.

products.title: Universal Travel Adapter
products.description: All-in-one international power adapter with USB ports. Compatible with outlets in 150+ countries.

products.title: Memory Foam Travel Pillow
products.description: Ergonomic neck pillow with memory foam core and breathable cover. Includes carrying case.

products.title: Packing Cubes Set
products.description: 6-piece compression packing cube set with water-resistant nylon. Includes laundry bag.

products.title: Portable Power Bank
products.description: 20000mAh high-capacity power bank with fast charging. TSA-approved for carry-on luggage.

products.title: RFID Travel Wallet
products.description: Genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology. Multiple compartments for passport and cards.
